entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is mentioned as a person and Sirius's brother. The text states 'That was Sirius’s brother, wasn’t it?'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as silently pointing at the sign on Regulus's door.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as being related to Regulus.

relationships.description: Harry visited Regulus's door and tried to open it.
Harry was accompanied by Hermione when he visited Regulus's door.
